pages.text: $(italic)It happens again and again that you just quickly put down a box to store your belongings and as soon as you come back everything is looted.$(br)To solve this problem you have developed this special chest, which takes care of the problem and can even help to catch the thief in the act.

The Heartbound Chest provides the same space as two normal chests.$(br2)Similar to a Trapped Chest the Heartbound Chest also outputs a redstone signal. If you as the owner open it, the signal strength will be full, if a stranger wants to tamper with your belongings then only half.
